channel.title: left 4 dead 2 crash
channel.description:
I just got l4d 2 and l4d 1 :3
but when I start playing l4d 2 the game crashs! and I don't know the problem :'( can somebody tell how can I fix this? please.

item.title: left 4 dead 2 crash
item.dc:creator: Adonay13
item.description:
DinoThrasher:

Go into the L4D2 directory and delete the autoexec. I don’t know if this will work since it’s a clean install, not just an update, but I started getting crashes right after I downloaded the new “The Sacrficie” update. This fixed it for me, and searching through the Steam forums it appeared to fix it for others as well.

dosen’t work but my brother told me about the crashs and tell me how to fixed

but anyway thaks

Read full topic

item.title: left 4 dead 2 crash
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
Go into the L4D2 directory and delete the autoexec. I don’t know if this will work since it’s a clean install, not just an update, but I started getting crashes right after I downloaded the new “The Sacrficie” update. This fixed it for me, and searching through the Steam forums it appeared to fix it for others as well.

Read full topic

item.description:
open up event viewer and let us know the specifics of the crash
